author: dougts
title: One of the Best Sets of the Year (any theme)
review:
Pros

  • Fantastic parts selection in some great colors - i.e. - white boat hulls, trans purple 1x2, more
  • Heartlake City actually has boys!
  • Tons of playability
  • Fully furnished, no corners were cut
  • intricate details, especially in the interior
  • 2 dolphins are different shades - nice touch
  • enjoyable building experience

Cons

  • Only 3 minidolls (not surprising for Friends, but a Captain would have been a nice touch)

A fantastic design with great parts and nice detailed touches.  Should be a must have for any Friends fan, and is in my opinion one of the finest non-exclusive sets of the year - in any theme.

author: Bella_Sparkle
title: Great Set!
review:
The Lego friends Dolphin Cruiser is a must have Lego set for all young girls.

Box/Instructions

The instructions are clear and concise. The box provides plenty of photos for young girls to clearly see what they are building.

Parts

The interesting parts keep girls in suspense to see what will come next(instead of the usual 2x3 pieces). The color palette is girly.

Mini Figures

Great decision adding a boy into this set. Which is very rare in girls' sets.

The build

The build was great fun. It took me about 2-3 days to build.

The completed model

Spectacular! Entertaining to play with! My brother loves combining our sets to create more clever games!

Overall opinion

Great set! Must have! Entertainment for hours!
